name: Bidirectional Range Follower
description: Keeps the vault fully allocated (100%) by tracking price above or below the current range, dynamically adjusting the new range with asymmetric distance parameters.

name: Time-Based Range Refresh
description: If price stays outside the active range for too long, suggest reallocation using current side of liquidity (no swap).

name: Loss-Aware Rebalance
description: Tracks the entry price of the last position and warns if a rebalance would cause value loss due to opposite price movement.

name: Dynamic Width Adjustment
description: Dynamically adjusts the range width based on recent volatility.

name: Fee Profit Filter
description: Only triggers rebalance when fee gain exceeds minimum profit threshold after gas costs.
